ygData.subject: Re: NEW TO CLUB!! Anyone on Drinal??
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, ertuio2000, fellow Drinalian (?) -- I have two characters I play regularly on Drinal, and a third that I dabble with
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, ertuio2000, fellow Drinalian (?)
--<br><br>I have two characters I play regularly on Drinal,
and a third that I dabble with
occasionally:<br><br>Kharlisht is a 27th level Dwarf Rogue, about one kill away
from 28. Undinged, so that kind of sucked. Currently
in Rivervale/Misty Thicket, looking for
Slaythe.<br><br>Nazbeku is an 11th level Troll Shadow Knight, currently
in South Ro. Haven't grouped much with her, and
faction is an issue, since I'm not playing to get into
Freeport or anything. So, for now, staying close to home
-- Grobb.<br><br>Uenlaenae (I hate that name) is a
7th level Wood Elf Warrioress. Just wanted to see
what it was like from the other side of the MOb from
my Rogue.<br><br>Feel free to drop me a line if you
see any of these folks on line. Usually late at night
U.S. Pacific time. Unfortunately, I haven't had time
to do much grouping, so I've been concentrating on
the SK. Yyou might catch me at a good time, though,
so give it a
shot.<br><br>Kharlisht/Nazbeku/Uenlaenae
